data.text: @BenWWeston @DavidCrowleyWI @mkecounty @MKEhealth @ReadyMKE I feel like areas with mitigation efforts that WERE in place are seeing increases while others are flatlining. As someone who agreed with mitigation I acknowledge that it’s futile at this point. Every man for themselves. I still mask in stores.

@JTSWIS @DavidCrowleyWI @mkecounty @MKEhealth @ReadyMKE Jury's out. On one ✋ we likely have at least for short term ~good community immunity from vacc + infection induced immunity from omicron so hopefully can weather BA.2 without much change in trajectory. 

On the other ✋ BA.2 emerging fast, shows ⬆️ transmissibility, and...

And of course, credit to the always informative, great medical detective @mtosterholm for "hope is not a strategy!"

@CIDRAP #OsterholmUpdate
